news_items.title: Combined Authority Mayoral election update
news_items.description: Voters will go to the polls on Thursday 1 May to decide who should be the first elected mayor for Hull and East Yorkshire.

news_items.title: Proposed memorial gardens
news_items.description: Hull City Council and East Riding of Yorkshire Council have committed to providing permanent memorials to those involved in the Legacy Funeral Director investigation. Access the plans and give your thoughts on the designs through our survey..

news_items.title: How often do you feel lonely or isolated?
news_items.description: The Imperial College London are investigating social isolation and loneliness in the population. You can take part by completing the brief survey.
